column4: i'm trying to install a packge on a dapper install, and i'm having some packge version issues: perl: Depends: perl-base (= 5.8.7-5ubuntu1.2) but 5.8.7-10ubuntu1 is to be installed - anyone know how i can get around it? (or if i can get the new version from somewhere)
sorry, steped out.. i used debootstrap to setup the system, and its fresh (nothing added after the debootstrap)
(reg the packge version problem with perl-base)
